Articles.Content:
KSP: 1.8.1 Windows 64bit

Problem: The Game freezes on the Muns surface, while driving a rover

Mods installed:

[x] Science! Continued (xScienceContinued 5.23)
B9 Part Switch (B9PartSwitch v2.11.1)
BetterBurnTime (BetterBurnTime 1.10)
Chatterer (Chatterer 0.9.98)
ClickThrough Blocker (ClickThroughBlocker 0.1.9.3)
Community Category Kit (CommunityCategoryKit 5.0.0.0)
Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack 1.3.0.0)
Community Tech Tree (CommunityTechTree 1:3.3.7)
Contract Configurator (ContractConfigurator 1.28.0)
Easy Vessel Switch (EVS) (EasyVesselSwitch 2.0)
Hide Empty Tech Tree Nodes (HideEmptyTechNodes 1.1.1)
Interstellar Fuel Switch (InterstellarFuelSwitch 3.12.2)
Interstellar Fuel Switch Core (InterstellarFuelSwitch-Core 3.12.2)
Kerbal Alarm Clock (KerbalAlarmClock v3.11.0.0)
Kerbal Attachment System (KAS 1.5)
Kerbal Engineer Redux (KerbalEngineerRedux 1.1.7.1)
Kerbal Inventory System (KIS 1.23)
Kerbal Planetary Base Systems (KerbalPlanetaryBaseSystems v1.6.10)
MechJeb 2 (MechJeb2 2.9.0.0)
Patch Manager (PatchManager 0.0.17)
Procedural Fairings (ProceduralFairings 1:v1.6.2)
Procedural Fairings - For Everything! (ProceduralFairings-ForEverything v0.3.0)
SCANsat (SCANsat v18.14)
Toolbar (Toolbar 1:1.8.0.5)
TriggerAu Flags (TriggerAu-Flags v2.9.3.0)
TweakScale - Rescale Everything! (TweakScale v2.4.3.10)

Reproduction steps:

With the included savefile once entering a rover positioned on the Mun within a few 100m of driving the game freezes the picture, sound goes on. I was however able to load built a new Rocket and launch this to LKO, so it seem connected to the rover. Game needs to be force quit.

Log:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/5196tih522np23o/AAB34bM0VK-kxVxYj3Jsbniha?dl=0

The log however didn't update with the crash. Also player.txt added and save file .rar.

I was able to get around it myself. I changed all the graphics settings to the lowest value, apart from resolution. Then I put them up to maximum step by step, one after the other, reloading every time and testing. The error didn’t return again, I now have even higher graphic settings than before. Before this I couldn’t travel more than 100m without the game crashing, after it my rover drove 60km.
